name: Incremental Volume Build (3 sets to 5 sets over weeks)
time_per_session_breakdown: 3-5 sets x ~12 reps each plus rest
overview_and_execution: Week1: 3 sets of 8-12. Week2: 4 sets. Week3: 5 sets. Each set near 1-2 RIR. Week4: deload or reduce sets. Then repeat with heavier loads or new rep range.
example_application: Overhead Press: W1 = 3×10@60 lb, W2=4×10@60 lb, W3=5×10@60 lb, W4=2×10@50 lb (deload). Then progress load next cycle.
important_notes: Gradually increases volume to spur hypertrophy. Keep form consistent. Best for intermediate lifters needing cyclical volume.
